Job Title: Sports Marketing Strategist

Location: Miami, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Business Development, Marketing

Description:
Are you a highly competitive individual with a background in sports? Do you consider yourself an ambitious individual thriving for constant improvement? Are you a team player? Are you able to perform under positive pressure? 
Elevate your career in our dynamic marketing team, where we channel the spirit of competition into cutting-edge marketing strategies. We're seeking individuals with a passion for winning, a drive for success, and a background in the competitive world of sports. Join us and turn your competitive edge into a powerful force in the marketing arena!
StandUp is a Miami-based start up, our mission is to make boring marketing exciting through bold promotional campaigns that breathe new life into brands meanwhile we make an impact around the world through memorable experiences! Standup innovative strategies, effective client engagement, a passionate/fresh/ambitious team and a unique approach to marketing lead the firm to be fastest growing marketing firm in FloridaWe specialize in creating unforgettable experiences for a diverse range of clients. If you're passionate about communication, events, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we want you to be a part of our growing team.

Position Overview:As a Competitive Sports Marketing Strategist, you'll bring a winning mentality to our marketing campaigns. Your experience in competitive sports will serve as a foundation for developing innovative strategies that resonate with our target audience. If you're ready to translate your passion for competition into the world of marketing, this is the opportunity you've been waiting for.
Responsibilities:Develop and execute high-impact marketing strategies that leverage the competitiveness of sports.Utilize data-driven insights to analyze and anticipate market trends, staying one step ahead of the competition.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create and implement marketing campaigns that showcase a winning mentality.Leverage your competitive spirit to drive results and exceed marketing objectives.Lead small groups workshops and GoalsDevelop public speaking skillsStay updated on industry developments and integrate best practices into marketing strategies.Help creating a competitive/ positive culture and environtment
Qualifications:Background in competitive sports, demonstrating a drive for success and winning mentality.Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field.Proven experience in developing and implementing successful marketing strategies.Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.Excellent communication and negotiation skills.Creative mindset and ability to think strategically in a competitive landscape.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Benefits:Competitive salary with performance-based bonusesOpportunities for professional development and advancementHealth insurance coverageAccess to exclusive events and networking opportunities in the competitive sports worldCollaborative and high-energy team culture
Organizing team dinners at premier dining establishments to foster professional relationships and provide a conducive environment for collaborative discussions and team building.
We are an equal opportunity employer and encourage individuals from diverse competitive sports backgrounds to apply. Join us and be part of a team that thrives on the drive for success!
WEBSITE: www.standup-promotions.com

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
